name: Quick Space Dungeon
description:
A simple trial and error puzzle game. Click on items on the bottom of the screen, and drag them onto the enemies at the top of the screen to use them. Try to make it through the whole game and defeat the final boss!

Made for Trijam 44, a gamejam where you have only 3 hours to implement the game.

Made by Abregado, Jiri, Sanqui, and wheybags.

https://github.com/abregado

https://github.com/jiri

https://github.com/sanqui

https://github.com/wheybags

Source available at https://github.com/jiri/untitled-game-jam-project
